M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.GraphicLauncher
The main method of the game.
mainContentPane - Variable in class main.GraphicLauncher
The main frame of the program window
makeBread(Grain, Board) - Method in class jobs.Baker
This method took a Grain object to read the amount value and then return a bew Bread object with the amount value equals to (grain amount / 2 +1).
Man - Class in base
Base object to create differents type of human beigns.
Man() - Constructor for class base.Man
Empty constructor.
Man(int, int, Money, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class base.Man
Its it possible to change the lenght of the name by change the minName and maxName variables inside the constructor.
map - package map
 
Marshal - Class in jobs
A specialization of Man.
Marshal(int, int, Money, int, int, int) - Constructor for class jobs.Marshal
Create a new Marshal and set the icon to 'A'.
The Man object create a random name automatically.
marshalDistributeTaxes() - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
Search for the marshal of the town and distribute the taxes.
Mayor - Class in jobs
A specialization of Man.
Mayor(int, int, Money, int, int, int) - Constructor for class jobs.Mayor
Create a new Mayor and set the icon to 'Y'.
The Man object create a random name automatically.
The mayor have a specific wallet for the taxes separated from his money.
mayorCollectTaxes() - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
Search for the mayor of the town and collect the taxes.
melt(MinedGold) - Method in class jobs.Blacksmith
This method takes an object of type MinedGold to "melt" it into money.
mergeLists(ObjectsList) - Method in class utils.ObjectsList
Create a new array wich is a copy of the actual array but with length equal to the length of the actual array and the array in the otherObjectList.
Milk - Class in resources
A variety of resource named "Milk".
Milk(int) - Constructor for class resources.Milk
A new milk object whit the amount value defined by the construcor.
MinedGold - Class in resources
A variety of resource named "Mined gold".
MinedGold(int) - Constructor for class resources.MinedGold
Create a new Mined Gold item with a specific amount.
Miner - Class in jobs
A specialization of Man.
Miner(int, int, Money, int, int, int) - Constructor for class jobs.Miner
Create a new Miner and set the icon to 'M'.
The Man object create a random name automatically.
Money - Class in resources
This item is used like a 'wallet' to store money value on is quantity attribute.
Money() - Constructor for class resources.Money
Create a empty Money with 0 value for quantity.
Money(double) - Constructor for class resources.Money
Create a new Money with a personalized quantity value.
moveAllAnimals(Board) - Method in class main.AnimalList
This method will read all the animals on this list and generate a 10% probability to move one of echa his animals in one random direction.
Also controll if the animal is a fish to move only through the water.
moveAllCitizens(Board, CitizenList) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method read a CitizenList and, for each citizen in the list, generate one random direction (up, down, left, right) and move the citizen in that direction.
MoveController - Class in main
This class is used to move different Man objects inside the matrix of the Board.
MoveController() - Constructor for class main.MoveController
 
moveDown(JTextArea, JTextArea) - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
If its possible move the selected citizen down
moveLeft(JTextArea, JTextArea) - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
If its possible move the selected citizen to the left
Movement - Interface in utils
This interface forces implementers to write the methods of the different movement actions on a board.
movementLog(Man) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method register the movement of one Man object on the ActionsLog.
moveOneCitizenDown(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method move the citizen down X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
moveOneCitizenLeft(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method move the citizen to the left X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
moveOneCitizenRight(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method move the citizen to the right X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
moveOneCitizenUp(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.MoveController
This method move the citizen up X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
moveRight(JTextArea, JTextArea) - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
If its possible move the selected citizen to the right
moveSomethingDown(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingDownWater(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingLeft(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingLeftWater(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingRight(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingRightWater(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingUp(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveSomethingUpWater(Object) - Method in class map.Board
This method run over the array till found the indicated object.
moveUp(JTextArea, JTextArea) - Method in class main.GraphicLauncher
If its possible move the selected citizen up
